snippet: The Supreme Court will soon decide whether to hear a case about a class action suit against Facebook that awarded plaintiffs’ lawyers millions while class members got nothing.
abstract: Adam Liptak Sidebar column; Supreme Court will decide whether to hear case about a class action suit against Facebook that struck a novel bargain--plaintiffs’ lawyers were awarded millions while class members got nothing.
lead_paragraph: The Supreme Court will soon decide whether to hear a case about a class action suit against Facebook that awarded plaintiffs’ lawyers millions while class members got nothing.

headline.print_headline: When Lawyers Cut Their Class-Action Clients Out of the Deal
headline.main: When Lawyers Cut Their Clients Out of the Deal
